price: 49.  Voilà qui est un rappel. Ce sont les gens pieux qui auront le plus heureux retour.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
